nodes.text: During the Imperial Era, Duke Blazor of the Black Sun criminal syndicate was owed a large sum of money by the Gatto Gang trio of criminals. Blazor thus hired the bounty hunter IG-88 to capture them for him, and the hunter successfully did so after tracking down the gang on a rocky planet. At some point between 34 ABY and 35 ABY, the monster droid CR-8R told the cartographer Emil Graf of IG-88's hunt.

Blazor was mentioned in the story "Tales from Wild Space: IG-88 vs. the Gatto Gang," which was featured in issue 9 of the anthology comic-book series Star Wars Adventures. The story was written by Nick Brokenshire and published by IDW Publishing on April 18, 2018.
